name: New Dinosaur Land Hunter
description:
New Dinosaur Land Hunter is a thrilling 3D game. Explore the huge city map with your giant 3D Dinosaur.

Game Features:
- Multiple addictive challenges and missions.
- Console quality HD graphics.
- No connectivity required while playing.
- Full of action and interesting game play.
- Awesome 3d graphics and prehistoric jurassic park environments.
